channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How to measure elapsed time with Ruby
item.description: starting = Process.clock_gettime(Process::CLOCK_MONOTONIC) # time consuming operation ending = Process.clock_gettime(Process::CLOCK_MONOTONIC) elapsed = ending - starting elapsed # => 9.183449000120163 secon
